label: Nutrition and the Life Cycle
description: Examines physiological changes that occur during gestation, postnatal growth, and aging and the influence of these changes on nutritional requirements. Offered every other year. Prerequisite: FSHN 220 or consent of instructor.
courseSectionInformation: Prerequisite: FSHN 220 or consent of instructor.
sectionRegistrationNotes: Restricted to students with Sophomore, Junior, or Senior class standing. Restricted to BS:F Sc&Hum Nutrition-HN -UIUC or BS:F Sci&Hm Nutr-Diettcs -UIUC.
